trans-unit.source: News record
Versatile news system.
Language of the news record.
Define a date on which the news record should be shown.
trans-unit.target: Odredi datum kada će vijest biti prikazana

trans-unit.source: Define a date on which the news record should be hidden.
trans-unit.target: Odredi datum kada će vijest biti skrivena

trans-unit.source: Select the user groups which are allowed to see the news record.
trans-unit.target: Odredi grupe korisnika kojima je dopušten prikaz vijesti.

trans-unit.source: If checked, this news record can only be edited by administrators.
trans-unit.target: Ako je označeno, vijest može uređivati samo administrator.

trans-unit.source: Hidden records are not shown in the frontend.
News title
Alternative Title will be used as the title for the browser window / tab
trans-unit.target: Zamjenski naslov biti će prikazan kao naslov u prozoru / kartici preglednika

trans-unit.source: Be aware that it can be cropped.
Select the type which can be either a normal news record, a link to an internal page or a link to an external page.
trans-unit.target: Odredi vrstu: vijest, poveznica na unutarnju stranicu ili poveznica na vanjsku stranicu

trans-unit.source: Top news records can get a special treated concerning layout, sorting, ...
trans-unit.target: Posebne vijesti mogu imati poseban izgled, sortiranje...

trans-unit.source: Author of the news record
Email address of the author
Date of the news record
Archive date. A date is required if the news record should once be treated as archived news.
Main content of the news record
Select the categories which are related to this record.
Define and select tags which fit to the article.
Select related news records.
Show news which select current news record as related.
trans-unit.target: Prikaži vijesti kojima je ova vijest povezana

trans-unit.source: Define related links to internal and external pages.
trans-unit.target: Odredi poveznice prema unutarnjim i vanjskim stranicama
